capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. I'm pretty sure she attended the school during her teenage years. She was an incredibly smart and resourceful student, always seeming to find herself in the right place at the right time.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of hermione before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is a great example of a strong and intelligent female character in literature. I think she's an amazing role model for young girls everywhere, don't you?
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i didn't know that you're a woman, valeria! that's great to learn about you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is a great example of a strong and intelligent female character in literature. I think she's an amazing role model for young girls everywhere, don't you?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly the boy who lived, and it's incredible to think about what he went through at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine being famous in the wizarding world just because you're "the one" destined to defeat Voldemort? It's a lot of pressure, but I think Harry handled it pretty well.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of him before, but i just learned that you're talking about harry potter!

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly the boy who lived, and it's amazing to think about what he went through at Hogwarts. capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into Neville and it's interesting to know that he's a male. I'm quite certain about this information, and I'd say it's a fact rather than an opinion.
So, Neville is a guy, right? I mean, he's definitely a male. I'm pretty sure of that. He's not a woman or non-binary, so... yeah, just a straight-up male.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've heard that the character Filch in Harry Potter is often portrayed as a bit of a grump, but I think he's actually just trying to do his job and keep the school tidy. He's not all bad, you know?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a calm demeanor about him. He's got a very mean streak when it comes to his sense of humor, though - don't even get me started on the jokes he tells!
